summary: Two white traders in the darkest Africa of the 1870s find a missionary's daughter, who was captured as a child by a savage tribe and now worshiped as a goddess.
cast: Harry Carey|Edwina Booth|Duncan Renaldo|Mutia Omoolu|Olive Carey|Bob Kortman|Marjorie Rambeau|C. Aubrey Smith|Riano Tindama
keywords: husband and wife played by real husband and wife|character name as title|nickname in title|surname in title|reader horn character
title: Trader Horn
